creator: michael.trindler@id.unizh.ch
text:
(in all publications)

after archiving/deleting a document i tried to restore it

-> An Error Occurred

Exception in ServerPagesGenerator.generate()

ServerPagesGenerator.generate(): java.lang.ClassCastException

Another problem is, that I "restore" is deactivated in the menu in site tab.
Will fix that tomorrow.
creator: roku@apache.org
roku@apache.org
text: I fixed this. Unfortunately "restore" is deactivated in menu on site tab.
